subject: Complaint on behalf of Overgas Inc. (Bulgaria)
text:
CONFIDENTIAL

Dear Mses. Lobillo Borrero and Garcia Mezquita,

Dear Messrs. Baldwin, Mayet and Watine,

 

On behalf of Overgas Inc., Bulgaria’s largest private trader of natural gas, we would like to inform you of the attached formal
complaint, which has been filed today.

 

The complaint addresses several violations of Bulgaria’s obligations under the SoS Regulation, which also have been subject to
several of Overgas’ previous contacts and discussions with DG ENER.

 

Please do not hesitate to contact us should you have any questions in this regard.

 

Kind regards,

Sebastian Gröss

 

SEBASTIAN GRÖSS  |  RECHTSANWALT (PRINCIPAL ASSOCIATE)

 

SZA Schilling, Zutt & Anschütz  Rechtsanwaltsgesellschaft mbH
